idea:
Houzeo is an online platform that digitizes the process of buying and selling homes. Houzeo circumvents traditional intermediaries and empowers the consumer by giving them access to technologies only real estate agents have.


Houzeo products include the IntelliList Listing Management System, Houzeo Showings, Houzeo Offers, DigiTransact, Pro Directory, and the Houzeo Buyer Search.
name: Houzeo India
